name: Introduction to Earth Science
description: An introduction to the fundamentals of Earth Science. Topics may include geology, geography, geochemistry, geophysics, oceanography, meteorology, and astronomy.

name: Geology
description: A study of the physical structure and processes of the Earth, its history, and its mineral and energy resources.

name: Atmospheric Science
description: A study of the Earth's atmosphere, including the physics and chemistry of the atmosphere, meteorology, and climate change.

name: Meteorology
description: A study of the physics and dynamics of the atmosphere, including the physics of clouds, precipitation, and storms.
